controller

Class Conference

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Conference

  • public class Conference
extends java.lang.Object
    This Conference object is just a temporary container to efficiently pass data to and from the Controller. It can be instantiated long enough pack multiple Objects in a data structure which is then unpacked and the data can be retrieved. There isn't a full set of Conference Objects always available to reflect all the conferences existing in the database.
    Version:
    90 Date: 11/15/13
    Author:
    Jacob Hall

          java.lang.String the_conference_summary)
        Constructor for the Conference Object
        Parameters:
        the_conf_title - The title of the conference.
        the_program_chair - The username of the PC.
        the_conf_date - The Date of the conference.
        the_conf_address - The address of the conference.
        the_conf_city - The city of the conference.
        the_conf_state - The state the conference is in.
        the_con_zip - The zip code the conference is in.
        the_submission_deadline - The deadline for paper submissions.
        the_review_deadline - The deadline for reviews to be turned in.
        the_sub_pc_recommend_deadline - The deadline for the SubPC's recommendation.
        the_author_notification_deadline - The deadline for notifying the author.
        the_conference_summary - The description of the conference.
